channel.title: A few questions (orbs , commands)
channel.description:
On a blank client how would i add orbs to it? (HP, run energy & prayer)
& also what could i add as a command to play sounds from a command , like a ::sound ### like the emote command but it plays a sound.
any help is much appreicated/
